name: wiki-js
tagline: A modern and extensible self-hosted wiki
description: Wiki.js is a modern, self-hosted wiki platform with a rich editor, authentication, search, and versioning. It supports multiple backends, integrations, and themes, and can be self-hosted or used via commercial cloud hosting.

features.title: Markdown Support
features.description: Create content with a powerful WYSIWYG editor, markdown, or code editor based on preference

features.title: Authentication Options
features.description: Support multiple authentication methods including LDAP, OAuth, SAML, and local accounts

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Find content instantly with powerful full-text search powered by Elasticsearch or database search

features.title: File Upload
features.description: Upload and organize images, documents, and media files with a built-in asset manager

features.title: Access Control
features.description: Define granular permissions controlling who can read, write, or manage specific pages or sections

features.title: Theme Customization
features.description: Choose from multiple themes or create custom designs to match your brand
